about_the_game:
Explore Countless Words


Have you already played through all of our official word packs? Don't worry, there's still plenty more to explore. New word packs, created by our fantastic community, are appearing every day in the world of Scribble It! and are immediately available to you!

Intuitive Controls and Advanced Tools


In most cases, a brush and some colors are enough. But sometimes more advanced tools are needed to create true masterpieces.
In both cases, we have something for you. Our tool bar offers the most important tools and makes them accessible in an intuitive way. But more sophisticated tools are just one click away!

Twitch.tv - Collaborate with Your Viewers


Collaborate with your audience and compete against other streamers in Stream Wars! Viewers can choose words and write solutions! The Twitch.tv integration allows you to interact with your audience in a completely new way.





"IM A GOD AT THIS GAME!"
- CouRage

"Please don't guess it ... OH FUCK HE GUESSED IT!!!"
- VanossGaming

"They are gonna call me Raecasso"
- Valkyrae

"this game is so fun, i played this with my dad and had the best time of our lives"
- Steam User

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04.6 LTS
  • Processor: Intel® Dual-Core 2.4 GHz / AMD® Athlon 64 X2 Dual-Core 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ 600 Series / AMD® Radeon HD 7000 Series / Intel® HD Graphics 5000 with 512MB VRAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan compatible graphics card is required.

  • Processor: Intel® Core i3-2100 (3.1 GHz) or better

  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Vulkan compatible graphics card is required.

short_description: Scribble It! is a multiplayer drawing and guessing game. Get in a lobby with up to 16 players and choose from thousands of official words, packaged in a variety of high-quality themes and 3 multiplayer game modes. Perfect for game nights, parties or just hanging out with friends.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Italian, Dutch, Romanian, Vietnamese, Swedish, Slovak, Ukrainian, Hindi, Korean, Czech
